
# lib-resource-path (v0.0.2)


---------------------------------------------------------------------


## Getting Started

Install via NPM:
```bash
npm install @liquicode/lib-resource-path
```

Include the library in your source code:
```javascript
const Lib = require( '@liquicode/lib-resource-path' );
```
